评论详情: I suffer from bilateral lymphedema in my legs which basically means one or both will randomly swell up. These are not see through, sort semi thick material, comfortable and fit well.
Fit great. Good quality product.  Soft and comfy.

Overall a good fit and good fabric weight (not see thru and or flimsy.  The waist is just a smidge larger than I expected but going down a size wouldn’t make it fit better.  So just be prepared to tug the wast back in place with active exercise like my Jazzercise class.

These are amazing!!! I usually don't write reviews but these are a total score. The fabric is elevated feeling and the fit is really flattering. The waist band is snug and stays in place without being too tight or constricting. (THANK YOU Amazon for making mid-rise tights, these are so hard to find!) the quality is comparable to a Lulu but they are so affordable! The length is a little closer to a 7/8 length but I'm also 5'10" and everything runs shorter on me... I've been buying Larges lately but the Medium fit me better so I'd say they run slightly larger compared to other brands. Overall amazing and great value!!
really gray and stretchy and too big
These fit very good and are a very good color, would buy these again.

评论概述: Leggings ripped and they are only 30 days old.
评论详情: I am so disappointed. I had previously ordered these leggings a few years ago and love them and they are still good even now, but the new pair that I just purchased ripped completely in the seat and I’ve only worn them twice. They must be by a different manufacturer. They are subpar quality. I’m so disappointed because I’m past my return date and I cannot use them so I paid for nothing. These are not the same quality as the original Amazon essentials leggings. I purchased two years ago. Very disappointed!

评论概述: Been loving these leggings for years
评论详情: Amazon Essentials has been selling this cut and style for a few years now (under different listings, and sometimes slightly different fabrics) and they’re always great. Thick, supportive, perfect amount of stretch, and good quality especially for the price. I got worried that they discontinued them before, but I think the long pants just go on sale as summer approaches, and then they re-stock on the shorts / capris.  I buy 4-5 pairs of these at a time, and I wear them almost every day like it’s my uniform at this point, lol! They hold up great! Out of all the pairs I’ve had, only 2 have frayed at the seams a little after tons of washes, and I’m not delicate with my clothing at all.
Bought two colors. Great for walks and working in the yard.

New favorite leggings. I am 5'6" ordered size small and they fit great. First pair of leggings that don't go all the way up to my chest. These go right above my belly button and that is what I prefer.

I have a short torso so I wish there were more mid range leggings available to purchase. High waisted leggings are just too high for me so I was excited to find these. The fit is great, but the fabric is a little shinier than I thought it would be. Also, since my thighs touch it makes a little switching sound when I walk lol! So these have become my inside leggings rather than for the gym. But they’re really comfortable!

After tons of searching, I ordered these in M based on reviews and the size chart, and they surpassed my expectations. I wanted decent but inexpensive leggings for Jiu-Jitsu, and exercising, and these are great. I wasn't sure about the sizing, because I recently lost over 30 lbs, but the M fit me perfectly. For reference, I'm 5'4, about 161lbs, 29" waist 41" hips. These actually fit my hips and thighs, without being big on my waist which is usually an issue for me. Definitely recommend.

I love these leggings! I’m 2 months postpartum and I wear these all the time - they help keep the mom pooch under control 😂 But, my favorite thing about them is that they are fur resistant! I have a dog that sheds worse than anything I’ve ever seen and his fur is so hard to get off of most clothes but it wipes right off of these - it’s amazing!
great fit

Love the leggings. I find that a lot of leggings are so high rise that it’s too much but these are perfect! They are super stretchy but don’t stretch out as the day goes by. Super comfortable and pass the squat test for transparency.

Imagine going into down dog and feeling the waist band sliding down in your hot yoga class… then almost falling because they were slippery and didn’t want to stay up . Higher waist than described. I quit trying to find petite fitting clothing. They look nice. Decent price. Just slippery. Not for me.

评论概述: Normal Size, good material not see thru.
评论详情: Don’t listen to the reviews and size down but your normal size, also they don’t go to the ankle. Other than that great product soft nice material not thin or see through.
Love these pants!  They are opaque and stay up.  They have great compression and thickness.  I’m pleased with the quality considering the price!! Would buy again!!

Loved the price point.  I found the leggings to be thick enough, they were not see through.  For me, they were a little higher on the waist than I wanted, but that could be my own body type.  The reason I gave them a lower star rating is because they were constantly sliding down.  I spent all day pulling them up.
The fit is not right, too big on waist and they loose all the time. Fabric is not starch enough and cheap quality.
Feel great
They are perfect.  Not too thick,  not thin.  Feel awesome on, not compression, but still hold everything in. Want them in every color.
Good fit and quality Very comfortable

I bought these during the sale and immediately bought a second pair after trying them on. They fit great, are super comfortable, and are very well made! This deal is too good to pass up! Highly recommend.

I purchased these because the reviews said buttery soft and I was wanting a casual wear legging. I was surprised to find that they are quite shiny. I have an athletic build and large calves but they gap at the knees and ankles. I could have sized down. The waist band and thickness are good. Just not very flattering because the shiny material shows every flaw.

These are soft to the touch and not see through. Be mindful of the size. I’ve lost a couple of pounds and now need to give these away because as I walk and move around they sag. The color is really nice and the fabric is soft so that you can’t feel the stitching like other cheap brands.
Love these leggings. They have good tummy control and the fit is perfect! Love the color too! Great value for money!
THESE LEGGINGS ARE NOT WHAT I THOUGHT THEY WERE, BUT I GUESS I DIDN'T READ CLOSELY ENOUGH. THEY RUN BIG, I WOULD RECOMMEND SIZING DOWN.
fit my generous sized daughter well
the color looks like photo. The fit is as expected. I suggest just ordering your normal size. The length seems fine.  The material feels smooth!  Pretty happy with these!
I needed leggings for my indoor sport and these were perfect for the price paid. Only thing I’m not a big fan of is the inseam in the crotch area but not a big deal
I love the feel of them. They're so soft and comfy. I would definitely buy them again. They're comparable to other leggings that cost 3 times as much. Great buy! ❤️
These are probably my new favorite leggings. I love the stretch and the extra support at the waist. Also can’t beat the price. I will definitely be buying more

评论概述: These will do, but not my favorite.
评论详情: These leggings are comfortable and at a good price.  Perfect for around the house.  I do look for legging that smooth out the needed smoothing areas, if you know what I mean.  These didn’t do that as much as I would have wanted, but I still kept them cuz they still work.
These feel like butter! I could live in these all day, everyday! Loved them so much I bought more!!
Feels great
Nice and thick but flexible and comfortable. True mid waist fit, I bought a second pair!
La tela es gruesa y se adaptó a mi figura, lo recomiendo, vale cada dólar!
Just wanted a pair of plain blue leggings and these are perfect. Very comfortable.
THESE LEGGINGS ARE SO SOFT. ALMOST CAN'T EVEN TELL YOUR WEARING THEM. THESE ARE TRUE TO SIZE. I ORDERED A SIZE LARGER BUT SHOULD HAVE ORDERED MY USUAL SIZE. OVERALL HAPPY WITH PRODUCT.

I reordered these leggings.  This time I ordered a Large.  They are perfect.  My 3 stars changed to a 5.  Super soft and comfortable.I gave 3 stars because the size was so off.  I ordered an XL.  They were big all over.  Even the legs were big.  However, the color was so pretty and the material was very nice.  I'm returning these and ordering a smaller size.
I wanted something cotton feeling. These were slick and tge waistband gapped for me.
These are very comfy. The fit is perfect. My only concern is they do not stay up when I'm running. I could have sized down but I feel like they would have been too tight.
I’m about 5’6 and I’m around 160 pounds.. ordered a large and they weren’t as long as I like my leggings to be but they weren’t as see through which is a plus.

评论概述: I got these on sale for $7
评论详情: That is all.

These pants are a little smaller than the normal yoga pants that I get. The color is really bright pink...too bright for me. You will be easily spotted at the gym in this bright color! I will be returning.

I am so bummed that I will be returning these. They fit great and are very comfortable. They seem to have a good amount of support, BUT they are SEE THROUGH!! That is a big no from me. They are just very sheer. If I only wanted to wear them in the house, it would be fine, but if I need to quickly run an errand, I would NOT be going out in public in these. That is the only reason I didn't give them a 4 or 5.

I wanted to love these especially for the price but they arrived in a bag that was full of dirt or some sort of yuck. Tried to look past that but after opening noticed the stitching on the leg already coming loose. They would not have made it through one wash. Returning.

These leggings are comparable to Nike leggings that I have spent twice as much on! The fabric is thick and soft. They are not see through or cheaply made. I did have to size up but will totally buy more in different colors!
Comfortable quality material. I want to buy more already in my cart.
I'm love material. They are actually full length which I have a difficult time finding.

评论概述: FINALLY a true mid-rise legging for athletic body types!
评论详情: I’ve purchased every kind of legging you could imagine. These check all the boxes: comfortable, squat proof, wide waistband, true mid-rise (I HATE super high rise), true to size and great price! Definitely will purchase a few more pairs. For reference, I purchased a medium and I am 5’6, 155(ish) lbs, athletic body type. Over all, love these. Highly recommend!

This is a dupe for old navy power soft leggings! You should purchase these because they are amazing! My one thing is that the material is a bit shiny because it feels like buttery on your skin  but I don’t personally mind that too much however some people might since it can cause them to slide down a bit. I’m use to pulling my leggings up and these you do like every other pair out there! I still love them and the color (I got light blue) is so cute and is exactly like pictured!
Bought for pajama bottom. Soft and comfortable.
really like the look
These leggings are exactly what I have been looking for. Love the fit, material, and that they are midrise. I can't wear the high waist, too tight on my waist line.
Thin but stretchy I got a 4x and love them!

评论概述: This is not mid-rise as described
评论详情: I bought this product because it was it stated to be a "mid-rise" waist.  I do not like high-rise waist athletic wear.  Try the product on and the quality is good but it was not mid-rise.  It was a high-rise waist. I've purchased other Amazon Essentials leggings because they were described as mid-rise and only one of the three pair I bought was actually a mid-rise. The others where high-rise even though they were purchased with a description as mid-rise.

Very happy with this purchase. The material is very soft and stretchy. I was even able to use these leggings for running! They are not the super suck everything in kind, but do provide medium support. I'll be ordering more pairs!

I have a vertical surgery scar on my abdomen that is easily irritated by various waistbands.. Therefore, I am picky about the wristbands on my pants. These have a nice wide smooth waistband that is not constricting & is a true mid rise. The material is very soft.
They seemed a little thin in the butt area but I wear them under things so it worked out just fine for me.
Exactly as described. I’m a petite person so the mid rise leggings are better for me. Great fabric!
These leggings are not flattering at all on me. They are too loose in the legs and stop at a odd length.
Great looking and material. Great fit on me.
They are way too big and would have liked an exchange but I missed the return window.  Anyway, size down.
Liked the color and length but the material was thin and see through

Awesome fit. They looked like they’d be tight but fit perfect and soooo comfy. Very flattering. I wore at 4 weeks postpartum. Small was my prepregnancy size in most clothes, I didn’t gain a ton and these run slightly large so the small fit perfect.  They hold up decent for light exercise but also look cute if you want to wear them for fashion.
I have the capris in this line. The full lenght are just as pretty and comfortable.

I was looking for a new pair of leggings after wearing my outdated worn out ones way too long,  The price was right, the reviews were good.  I gave it a try.They hold everything in real nice but still comfortable and look and feel good and sleek.  I definitely recommend them and would purchase again!
Amazon suggested a large. I bought a large. They have a lot of wrinkles from being too big.
Love these leggings.  I will buy more?
Bought these for the color which is great …. Very pretty blue. The seams are a little rough.
These are really soft, lightweight but not see through, and truly mid-rise! Probably could have gotten size small, but I like that these aren’t so constricting. Will order more colors.
These are real nice leggings  for the gym  or just running  errandsI like the mid rise  fit, which is sometimes  hard to find. I have 2 pair and will definitely  reorder
These are comfy. But they were too long for me. The color is beyond amazing though!
Smaller than other leggings
Color spot on fit true to size - great incentive to hit the gym
Love these leggings, planning to buy more.
Honestly, one of the best leggings I’ve ever bought
These are some of the most comfortable, supportive, none see through leggings that I’ve ever gotten online. Compared to some top name brands I’ll be purchasing these in other colors.
That they fit just right

Great fit especially if you don't want high rise workout pants. Great for a shorter torso.
Nice quality.  Fits as expected.  I will definitely order these in different colors!
These leggings are great! Comfortable and feel breathable (not super tight). I love that these have a mid rise. Highly recommend and great price 🙌🏼😊
If you want a pair of leggings that give you comfort all day and fit true to size then buy this product.

Love it
I actually really loved these, the only drawback is the placement of the tag in the back of the pants. It is right in the middle of your bottom. I love the way they look though and great material.

The fit and feel are just like crz yoga naked feeling mid rise. Thin, but not see through. Firm, but not restricted. I'm 5'7", an un-toned 134 lbs, 27 waist and 38 hip. Purchased a size small. Fits perfect.

They're ok, but a poor fit.  Super baggy in the knees and ankles, yet perfect fit on the hips and waist - very weird proportions.
These leggings were a fun try for me! As a very tall person of 5,10 these leggings were just too short for my liking. I did return mine but they were great quality and a very pretty vibrant color!!
I really like their leggings.

There is a seem at the top of the butt that slides down and pulls your underwear. I am constantly pulling these pants back up because that seem is sliding down and is so annoying.
